Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.modules

Class Modules

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.modules.Modules
public class Modules extends Object
Provides easy access to module resources. The resource(Listener listener, StringPath), resources(Listener listener, PackagePath), nestedResources(Listener listener, PackagePath) and nestedResources(Listener listener, PackagePath, Matcher) methods find resources and return them as ModuleResource object(s).
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
ModuleResource

  • Method Details

    • allNestedResources

      public static List<ModuleResource> allNestedResources​(Listener listener, PackagePath _package)
      Returns:
      A list of all ModuleResources under the given package

    • nestedResources

      public static List<ModuleResource> nestedResources​(Listener listener, PackagePath _package, Matcher<ModuleResource> matcher)
      Returns:
      A list of ModuleResources under the given package that match the given matcher

    • nestedResources

      public static List<ModuleResource> nestedResources​(Listener listener, PackagePath _package)
      Returns:
      A list of all ModuleResources under the given package

    • resource

      public static ModuleResource resource​(Listener listener, StringPath path)
      Returns:
      A single ModuleResource for the given path or null if no resource is found

    • resources

      public static List<ModuleResource> resources​(Listener listener, PackagePath _package)
      Returns:
      A list of the ModuleResources in the given package (but not any below it)
